void ResetUndo ()
 Should be called before properties are altered at the start of a group of property alterations that represent a single change transaction. This method calls "OnResetUndo()", which should be overridden if extra functionality is needed.
void Undo ()
 Restores the object to its state at the last call to "ResetUndo().

Detailed Description

Base class for objects that interact with the database.

delegate bool ALite.DBObject.ValidationDelegate ( string  propertyName,
ref string  errorMessage,
object  oldValue,
object  newValue 
)

Template for validation delegates.

Parameters:
propertyName Name of the property being validated
errorMessage Error message to return if the value is invalid
oldValue The current value of the property
newValue The new value of the property
Returns:
True if valid, false if not

virtual DBErrorCode ALite.DBObject.Save (  )  [virtual]

Based on the current status of the object, chooses whether to create, update or delete.

Returns:
Any errors returned during the save attempt

void ALite.DBObject.ResetUndo (  ) 

Should be called before properties are altered at the start of a group of property alterations that represent a single change transaction. This method calls "OnResetUndo()", which should be overridden if extra functionality is needed.

Implements ALite.IDBObject.

void ALite.DBObject.Undo (  ) 

Restores the object to its state at the last call to "ResetUndo().

Implements ALite.IDBObject.
